contentrichtext.text: {{archive}} '''This page is an archive of the discussion surrounding the proposed deletion of the page entitled [[Cha'an]].''' '''This page is kept as an historic record.''' '''The result of the debate was to keep the article.''' ---- Authors were clearly thinking of [[Chan]] (Chinese Zen), which is sometimes spelled ''Ch'an'', and which already has a much more complete entry. Article has multiple factual errors and hasn't been edited in more than a year. "Cha'an" is not a legitimate alternative spelling. * Keep and redirect. If it's a mis-spelling it's a common one - for instance [http://dir.yahoo.com/Society_and_Culture/Religion_and_Spirituality/Faiths_and_Practices/Buddhism/Schools__Lineages__and_Sects/Zen/Schools/Cha_an/] - [[User:Topbanana|TB]] 14:28, 12 May 2004 (UTC) * Redirect to [[Chan]]. Agree with TB. [[User:Andrewa|Andrewa]] 00:23, 13 May 2004 (UTC) * Agree with above [[User:Burgundavia|Burgundavia]] 06:30, May 13, 2004 (UTC) ---- This page is now preserved as an archive of the debate and is no longer 'live'. Subsequent comments on the issue should be placed on other relevant 'live' pages. '''Please do not edit this page.''' ----
